oracle text:
2/2
Whenever Banana Wizard enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard.
{1}{G}, {T}: Put a token that's a copy of the exiled card onto the battlefield under your control. It's a Banana in addition to its other types.
Whenever a Banana creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

Flavor Text: "Peel the magic."
